title: TST: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_clone.test_clone_datasets_root

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:

    res = clone("///", on_failure='ignore', result_xfm=None, return_type='list')

Legitimate URL gets butchered by replacing slashes with backslashes.
